about_the_game:
Tested to work on the Steam Deck!, Over 4 hours of playtime using our Extreme Battery Saver setting!

Niko's job as a Robocoder is to operate his discovery droid through the levels by writing programs for Mar10.
Develop your logic skills and progress through a hand crafted story-driven world on a fantastic adventure.
Experience the joys and troubles of programming an open-loop robot with True sandbox simulations to keep you on the edge of your seat!
Training your logic has never been so much fun!

10 Amazing Handcrafted re-playable Levels (More on the way, Check out the early access section for details)
Made in Unreal Engine 5!

Great Sound Track.


LiveLink Playground Real-time programming sandbox with physics toys and puzzles!
detailed_description:
Tested to work on the Steam Deck!, Over 4 hours of playtime using our Extreme Battery Saver setting!

Niko's job as a Robocoder is to operate his discovery droid through the levels by writing programs for Mar10.
Develop your logic skills and progress through a hand crafted story-driven world on a fantastic adventure.
Experience the joys and troubles of programming an open-loop robot with True sandbox simulations to keep you on the edge of your seat!
Training your logic has never been so much fun!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debain / Ubuntu / Pop / SteamOS
  • Processor: 2.2ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD GPU RX 480
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Debain / Ubuntu / Pop / SteamOS
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space

name: Robocoder - Dwarf Mountain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5ghz dual core or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1650
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2500 MB available space

short_description: Free Demo Available!. Fresh new unique gameplay, Like nothing you have played before! Take the role of Niko, programming Mar10 in this entirely new genre of Logic puzzle adventure! Early Access! Get involved now! Discord/Steam Community!
